Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to county reimbursement for detention costs
Summary: Requires the state to reimburse counties for costs incurred when holding parolees in detention facilities for technical parole violations pending a hearing with their parole officer.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to requiring state reimbursement for costs incurred by counties when holding individuals on parole violations
